name: Breaking Green
description:
You play as an individual in the midst of a financial crisis, due to past choices. Your circumstances lead you to turn to permaculture to pay of your debt and have a self-sustaining system. In order to pay of your debt, you  must utilise you surroundings and the everchanging world to produce a permaculture system in your apartment.

While accomplishing your goal of debt payments, you will learn about permaculture and the many methods it utilises. 

Credit: Programmers:
  • John Pelkman
  • Nicholas Fisher
Designers:
  • Yash Verma
  • Laci Coble
Artists:
  • Val Sequeira
  • Marcelo Mercuri
  • Tamara Shawky
